description: Install universal runtime validation enforcement for all Cursor agents
notes: GOAL: Enforce strict runtime validation at every patch execution
MISSION: Install global rule config and harden agent behavior
CONTEXT: Prevent false-positive completions, enforce validation rigor
SAFETY ENFORCEMENT: Runtime proof, mutation logs, dry-run audits required before any patch success
STABLE STATE CHECK: Ruleset must be picked up and honored by all agents
[ ] Rule file must be created at .cursor/rules/strict-execution.mdc
[ ] All hybrid blocks must inherit default enforcement flags
[ ] Patch execution must block unless validation gates pass
DOCUMENTATION LAW: Summary required before phase commit or tag

mutations.contents:
---
rule: strict-execution
appliesTo: all
priority: required
requires:
  - enforceValidationGate
  - strictRuntimeAudit
  - runDryCheck
  - forceRuntimeTrace
  - requireMutationProof
  - requireServiceUptime
onViolation: block
summary: |
  This rule enforces strict validation gates across all patch executions.
  Cursor agents may not return 'success' without:
  - Verified runtime mutation effect
  - Dry-run check
  - Active service confirmation
  - Mutation proof log
  - Summary file confirmation

execution.onReloadHang: Move to background and resume automatically
